response.overview: A daughter of a woman, a mother of a young child, a woman separated from her husband, and also a school counselor, Doa stands firm in the face of violence arising from these various dynamics and statuses, becoming a grey rock that withstands it all. However, through expressive art therapy, Doa begins to transform from a crouching, defensive grey rock into a moving, swaying rock, ready to confront and overcome even her deepest traumas. Can Doa simply live well as a human being, without any added descriptors? Through expressive arts therapy, Do-ah confronts her deep-seated trauma, transforming her life from a static existence to a dynamic journey of healing and growth. "Gray Rock" explores the resilience of the human spirit in overcoming inner conflicts.
response.title: Gray Rock
